verses.verse: Now these<WH428> are the kings<WH4428> of the land<WH776> whom<WH834> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> defeated,<WH5221> and whose land<WH776> they possessed<WH3423> beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383> toward the sunrise,<WH4217> <WH8121> from the valley<WH5158> of the Arnon<WH769> as far<WH5704> as Mount<WH2022> Hermon,<WH2768> and all<WH3605> the Arabah<WH6160> to the east: <WH4217>

Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> who lived<WH3427> in Heshbon,<WH2809> [and] ruled<WH4910> from Aroer,<WH6177> which<WH834> is on the edge<WH8193> of the valley<WH5158> of the Arnon,<WH769> both the middle<WH8432> of the valley<WH5158> and half<WH2677> of Gilead,<WH1568> even as far<WH5704> as the brook<WH5158> Jabbok,<WH2999> the border<WH1366> of the sons<WH1121> of Ammon;<WH5983>

and the Arabah<WH6160> as far<WH5704> as the Sea<WH3220> of Chinneroth<WH3672> toward the east,<WH4217> and as far<WH5704> as the sea<WH3220> of the Arabah,<WH6160> [even] the Salt<WH4417> Sea,<WH3220> eastward<WH4217> toward<WH1870> Beth-jeshimoth, and on the south,<WH8486> at the foot<WH8478> of the slopes<WH794> of Pisgah;<WH6449>
and the territory<WH1366> of Og<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan,<WH1316> one of the remnant<WH3499> of Rephaim,<WH7497> who lived<WH3427> at Ashtaroth<WH6252> and at Edrei,<WH154>

and ruled<WH4910> over Mount<WH2022> Hermon<WH2768> and Salecah<WH5548> and all<WH3605> Bashan,<WH1316> as far<WH5704> as the border<WH1366> of the Geshurites<WH1651> and the Maacathites,<WH4602> and half<WH2677> of Gilead,<WH1568> [as far as] the border<WH1366> of Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of Heshbon.<WH2809>

Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the Lord<WH3068> and the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> defeated<WH5221> them; and Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the Lord<WH3068> gave<WH5414> it to the Reubenites<WH7206> and the Gadites,<WH1425> and the half-tribe of Manasseh<WH4519> as a possession.<WH3425>

Now these<WH428> are the kings<WH4428> of the land<WH776> whom<WH834> Joshua<WH3091> and the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> defeated<WH5221> beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383> toward the west,<WH3220> from Baal-gad in the valley<WH1237> of Lebanon<WH3844> even as far<WH5704> as Mount<WH2022> Halak,<WH2510> which rises<WH5927> toward Seir;<WH8165> and Joshua<WH3091> gave<WH5414> it to the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> as a possession<WH3425> according to their divisions,<WH4256>

in the hill<WH2022> country,<WH2022> in the lowland,<WH8219> in the Arabah,<WH6160> on the slopes,<WH794> and in the wilderness,<WH4057> and in the Negev;<WH5045> the Hittite,<WH2850> the Amorite<WH567> and the Canaanite,<WH3669> the Perizzite,<WH6522> the Hivite<WH2340> and the Jebusite: <WH2983>
the king<WH4428> of Jericho,<WH3405> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Ai,<WH5857> which<WH834> is beside<WH4480> <WH6654> Bethel,<WH1008> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Hebron,<WH2275> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Jarmuth,<WH3412> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Lachish,<WH3923> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Eglon,<WH5700> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Gezer,<WH1507> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Debir,<WH1688> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Geder,<WH1445> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Hormah,<WH2767> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Arad,<WH6166> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Libnah,<WH3841> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Adullam,<WH5725> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Makkedah,<WH4719> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Bethel,<WH1008> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Tappuah,<WH8599> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Hepher,<WH9157> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Aphek,<WH663> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Lasharon,<WH8289> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Madon,<WH4068> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Hazor,<WH2674> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Shimron-meron, one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Achshaph,<WH407> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Taanach,<WH8590> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Megiddo,<WH4023> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Kedesh,<WH6943> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Jokneam<WH3362> in Carmel,<WH3760> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Dor<WH1756> in the heights<WH9338> of Dor,<WH1756> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Goiim<WH1471> in Gilgal,<WH1537> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Tirzah,<WH8656> one:<WH259> in all,<WH3605> thirty-one kings.<WH4428>
